name: PP-19
thoughts: Good damage roll with a great PvE talent combo. Keep it as it is for a 9k STA D3 build or re-roll Hurried or Predatory for Responsive or Ferocious to complement your build.

name: Military L86 LSW
thoughts: Average damage roll with great PvE talents. While not particularly useful, it can be a great starter weapon if you're still farming for good weapons. I'd re-roll Deadly for Ferocious.

name: C79 Scope (3.4x)
thoughts: The best attribute combo you can get on a sight. Best suited for SMGs since ARs can take VX-1 scopes.

name: Reflex Sight
thoughts: Great attrbute combo for ARs or LMGs if you're speccing into CHC/CHD.

name: SR-7 Suppressor
thoughts: Almost max CHD. Best suited for a DeadEYE MMR since it lacks CHC for other builds.

name: Loud Vent Brake
thoughts: Another great combo of attributes. I'd use it on SMGs.

name: Inventive Backpack
thoughts: Good armor with good Electronics. I'd re-roll CHD for Skill Power or Health and use it on Tactician or 4pc Reclaimer builds. It's expensive and there are blueprints for high end gear but if you have the funds, it's a great buy if you need one.

name: Lone Star Gloves
thoughts: The rolls are really great if you're looking to build a 4pc Lone Star set or a 3pc for a NinjaBike build. I'd re-roll Health on Kill for EAD. Expensive in the DZ funds so it's hard to justify the price unless you really need this piece.

name: Nomad Chest
thoughts: Average armor with almost max Stamina. It's a great buy if you're using a NinjaBike build with 1pc Nomad to unlock the 2pc bonus. Must buy for those kind of builds. I'd re-roll Skill Haste if you're speccing into HoK on other pieces or Hok for EAD.

name: Performance Mod
thoughts: Maximum Self Heal roll. Must buy.

name: Electronics Mod
thoughts: Almost max Electronics and Skill Power. A bit niche for some builds but the rolls are great.

name: Firearms Mod
thoughts: Not 4% Damage to Elites but 3% is a must if you don't have better ones.

name: Performance Mod
thoughts: Maximum roll. Good if for some than run Pulse as their second skill.
